Html:
A new release is out. This is a big update:

  • The updated tutorial includes double the content, with more screenshots and more in-depth coverage of advanced topics
  • Redesigned HTML/CSS to work better at all stages of the tutorial, with improved fluid layout
  • Updated with your questions and comments from the discussions, issue tracker, reviews, and in person at Web Camps

Please leave any questions or comments about the new release in the Discussions (general discussion or questions) or Issue Tracker (problems with the code).
